data.title: Fix EventListenerCustom registered by UILabel never has been released bug
Update web index
data.body: @pandamicro

data.title: cocos gen-libs - debug overwrites release
data.body:
Command1 debug mode:
cocos gen-libs -p android -m debug
generate file to: prebuilt\android\armeabi 

Command2 release mode:
cocos gen-libs -p android -m release
generate file to the same directories: prebuilt\android\armeabi 

Issue: Files are overwritten

Suggestion: add mode to output dir:
prebuilt\android\armeabi\release
prebuilt\android\armeabi\debug

Comments:
The same issue exist for other platforms.

data.title: DirectionLight has a bug
data.body:
http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/how-to-make-directionlight-works/23508/4

in iOS, Using DirectionLight makes distortion images.

data.title: Fix issue for web engine upgrade
mac模拟器console窗口无法响应鼠标选中log事件
data.body:
版本： cocos3.8.1
模拟器：  mac模拟器
现象：运行mac模拟器  会有两个window,  一个是游戏的window,  一个是日志的window(这里成为consoleWindow)
经调查代码consoleWindow是调用 openConsoleWindow 产生的，   生成后由于游戏window 一直调用mainLoop一直循环，  而consoleWindow无法响应鼠标选中log中的任何一行（注释掉mainLoop后consoleWindow能响应鼠标选中log）
对于mac模拟器 调试有很大影响

data.title: Low fps on Samsung Note 4 device
data.body:
I am using cocos2dx 3.8.1 which has CCEnhanceAPI-android.h file but still giving 20-30 fps on Samsung Note4 and giving 55-60 fps on other devices?
Samsung Note4 android version 5.0.1

Any idea how to fix this issue?

data.title: V3 winrt angle update to fix issue #9980
data.body:
This pull request updates the angle DLLs and angle template code to fix cocos2d-x issue cocos2d/cocos2d-x#9980. The issue was caused by gl_PointSize crashing on Windows Devices with QualComm drivers and DirectX 9_3.

external/config.json version has been updated to v3-deps-75. The PR request will not build without https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-bin/pull/181 being tagged as v3-deps-75.

There is no need to pull https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/14164 as this PR fixed the issue.

data.title: CPPCheck fixes, correct deallocation, array size.
data.body:
General Fixes:
- changed some delete operations to be deletions of arrays where applicable
- changed some "free" operations to "delete" where memory was allocated with "new"

CCPUScriptCompiler.cpp:
- added checks to see if temp1 and temp2 are non-null before dereferencing them

FileServer.cpp:
- changed the size of startFlag to be 13, seeing as the strcpy into it copies a string, "RuntimeSend:",
  is already 12 characters long, but strcpy() attempts to copy the NULL terminator too.

V3: fixed msbuild by removing incorrect AppxBundle properties from project
data.body: This pull requests fixes building the Windows 10 UWP apps from the command line using MSBuild. There was some incorrect AppxBundlePlatforms properties in the vcxproj for ccp-test and empty-test.

data.title: Simple 'merge(...)' version. 1. Easy to read 2. Recycled setRect(...)
data.body:
various name, "top1", "top2", "left1", "left2", "bottom1" etc 
I am so confused, So fix it easy to read.
And recycled setRect() function instead of hard coding.
It looks good. Good Luck.

data.title: remove duplicate include
data.body: duplicate include: #include "ui/CocosGUI.h"

data.title: Editbox multiline text should be verticle top.
data.body: In multiline Editbox the text should be vertically top align. Better to provide Api so user can set alignment of text as per requirement. But obviously in multiline textfield typing should start from top and after typing label should also start from top.

data.body: This fixes various compiler warnings on Xcode 7.

data.title: [AUTO][ci skip]: updating cocos2dx_files.json
EventListener will cause leak while deleting nodes during event dispatching
data.body: 这两天在检查内存漏洞的时候发现有大量的EventListenerCustom没有释放的问题, 我的多个朋友在开发的过程中也和我遇到相同的问题, 后网上搜索发现确实有不少开发人员也碰到相同问题, 这个问题是非常非常严重的, 具体内容可以根据这篇帖子. http://www.cocoachina.com/bbs/read.php?tid=202831
